text: Aur barabar nahi do darya yeh meetha hai piyas bujhata peenay mein khusgawar aur yeh doosra khaari hai kerwa tum inn dono mein say taza gosht khatay ho aur woh zewraat nikaltay ho jinhen tum pehantay ho. Aur aap dekhtay hian kay bari bari kashtiyan pani ko cheerney pharney wali inn daryayon mein hain takay tum uss ka fazal dhondo aur takay tum uss ka shukar kero
